headline: Dover (DOV): Evaluating Whether This Quiet Industrial Compounder Still Trades Below Its Fair Value
summary: Dover (DOV) has been quietly rewarding patient shareholders, with the stock up around 3% over the past month and roughly 7% in the past 3 months, outpacing many industrial peers. See our latest analysis for Dover. That near term strength sits against a more muted backdrop, with the 1 year total shareholder return still negative even as the 3 year total shareholder return remains solid. This suggests momentum is cautiously rebuilding around Dover at its recent $187.48 share price. If Dover’s...
